Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: I'm Tortimer! Rover just called me a few minutes ago.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: It was a short notice, but I managed to get a tent set up for you, as I understand you will have a shop built soon.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Oh me? I've lived in these woods for as long as I can remember.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: And my memory really depends on the day. Hehe.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: So about this business.. I suppose you should do mighty fine with the train tracks right here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: The train does come by on the regular too.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: It will be perfect for supplying them with all the raw materials we have.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: And on a different note, let's not forget to mention the beauty of this area!

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: While it can get lonesome at times, there is nothing like the peacefullness of this place.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: If you follow this road actually, my house is just at the end of it. Feel free to stop by whenever.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: As for your tent, it's just over to the right here.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: At that, I'll let you go out and explore. Remember to go to your bed in your tent to rest up as well.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Nice meeting you and I'll see you around!
